ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Models

Class ClaimList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Models.ClaimList

  • public class ClaimList
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper class for ArrayList with standard ArrayList methods. Also contains a list of listeners such that on updates, the appropriate lists are updated all at once.

      • setTagMan

        public void setTagMan(TagManager tm)
        This is a setter method to set the tag manager of a ClaimList. It provides a way of batch adding new tags rather than having to add them one by one to an existing TagManager
